Package org.jcatapult.security

Interface Summary
PasswordEncryptor<T> This interface is a simple password encryptor.
SaltSource<T> This interface defines a method for retrieving a salt that can be used for encryption of passwords.
UserAdapter<T> This interface is a user adapter that allows the JCatapult framework access to custom User objects.
 

Class Summary
ConfiguredSaltSource This class implements the SaltSource interface and provides a simple static salt source using the configuration property named jcatapult.security.salt.
EnhancedSecurityContext This class is a ThreadLocal holder that manages an SPI for getting the security credentials.
JCEPasswordEncryptor This class uses the JCE (Java Cryptography Extensions) to encode passwords.
 

Exception Summary
JCatapultSecurityException This class is the base class for all JCatapult security exceptions.
